data.lyric:
[ti:Things A Man Oughta Know]
[ar:Lainey Wilson]
[al:Sayin’ What I’m Thinkin’]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.84]Things A Man Oughta Know - Lainey Wilson
[00:02.37]
[00:25.12]I can hook a trailer on a two-inch hitch
[00:28.06]
[00:31.11]I can shoot a shotgun I can catch a fish
[00:33.97]
[00:36.94]I can change a tire on the side of a road
[00:40.15]
[00:42.52]Yeah I know a few things a man oughta know
[00:46.03]
[00:48.68]How to know when it's love
[00:51.63]
[00:52.20]How to stay when it's tough
[00:54.88]
[00:55.93]How to know you're messin' up a good thing
[00:58.88]
[00:59.40]And how to fix it 'fore it's too late
[01:02.35]And yeah I know a boy
[01:05.69]Who gave up and got it wrong
[01:08.53]
[01:09.12]If you really love a woman you don't let her go
[01:13.06]
[01:15.15]Yeah I know a few things a man oughta know
[01:18.66]
[01:21.70]If I can't have it I can do without
[01:24.58]
[01:27.47]I can hang a picture same as I can take it down
[01:30.62]
[01:33.56]And how to keep it hidden when a heart gets broke
[01:38.19]
[01:39.14]Yeah I know a few things a man oughta know
[01:43.08]
[01:45.24]How to know when it's love
[01:48.09]
[01:48.69]How to stay when it's tough
[01:51.51]
[01:52.52]How to know you're messin' up a good thing
[01:55.38]
[01:56.20]And how to fix it 'fore it's too late
[01:59.27]And yeah I know a boy
[02:02.29]Who gave up and got it wrong
[02:05.19]
[02:05.85]If you really love a woman you don't let her go
[02:09.57]
[02:11.66]Yeah I know a few things a man oughta know
[02:17.07]
[02:20.19]I
[02:22.27]
[02:27.31]How to know when it's love
[02:30.64]How to stay when it's tough
[02:33.54]
[02:34.38]How to chase forever down a driveway
[02:37.60]How to never let it get there in the first place
[02:40.95]And yeah I know a boy
[02:44.25]Who gave up and got it wrong
[02:47.67]If you really love a woman you don't let her go
[02:51.40]
[02:53.84]Well I know a few things a man oughta know
[02:59.73]Yeah I know a few things a man oughta know
data.trans:
[ti:Things A Man Oughta Know]
[ar:Lainey Wilson]
[al:Sayin’ What I’m Thinkin’]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.84]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.37]
[00:25.12]我能把拖车挂在两英寸的索结上
[00:28.06]
[00:31.11]我能开枪 我能抓鱼
[00:33.97]
[00:36.94]我能在路边换轮胎
[00:40.15]
[00:42.52]我了解一点男人应该了解的事
[00:46.03]
[00:48.68]如何察觉到爱情的到来
[00:51.63]
[00:52.20]如何在艰难日子挺下去
[00:54.88]
[00:55.93]如何知道自己将好事搞砸了
[00:58.88]
[00:59.40]在为时过晚之前如何弥补
[01:02.35]我认识一个男孩
[01:05.69]他放弃了 选错了路
[01:08.53]
[01:09.12]如果你真的爱一个女人 就不能放她走
[01:13.06]
[01:15.15]我了解一点男人应该了解的事
[01:18.66]
[01:21.70]如果我无法拥有 那没有我也能活
[01:24.58]
[01:27.47]我可以挂起一张照片 我也同样能把它取下
[01:30.62]
[01:33.56]当一颗心开始破裂 如何将它藏起
[01:38.19]
[01:39.14]我了解一点男人应该了解的事
